message:
### Error updating database.  Cause: java.sql.SQLException: Can't update table 'rbac_account' in stored function/trigger because it is already used by statement which invoked this stored function/trigger.
### The error may involve top.biandeshen.sandstorm.repository.AccountMapper.insertSelective-Inline
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: INSERT INTO rbac_account  ( id,account,password ) VALUES( ?,?,? )
### Cause: java.sql.SQLException: Can't update table 'rbac_account' in stored function/trigger because it is already used by statement which invoked this stored function/trigger.
; uncategorized SQLException for SQL []; SQL state [HY000]; error code [1442]; Can't update table 'rbac_account' in stored function/trigger because it is already used by statement which invoked this stored function/trigger.; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: Can't update table 'rbac_account' in stored function/trigger because it is already used by statement which invoked this stored function/trigger.
